name: Only New
Map Unit ID
content:
DICT = f.get('DICT') || {}
DICT[msg.key] = msg.payload.id
f.set('DICT', DICT)
log(msg.key + ':' + DICT[msg.key])

            "name": "Processor",\
            "content": "dew = f.get(\'dew\')\\nif (dew == \'good\') return\\n\\nlight = f.get(\'light\')\\nfan = f.get(\'fan\')\\naircon = f.get(\'aircon\')\\nlevel = aircon + fan\\n\\nif (light == \'0\') {\\n    if (dew == \'cold\') {\\n        pl(\'00\')\\n    } else {\\n        pl(\'10\')\\n    }\\n} else {\\n    if (dew == \'cold\') {\\n        switch (level) {\\n            case \'00\':\\n                return\\n            case \'01\':\\n                pl(\'00\')\\n                break\\n            case \'10\':\\n                pl(\'01\')\\n                break\\n            case \'11\':\\n                pl(\'10\')\\n                break\\n        }\\n    } else {\\n        switch (level) {\\n            case \'00\':\\n                pl(\'01\')\\n                break\\n            case \'01\':\\n                pl(\'10\')\\n                break\\n            case \'10\':\\n                pl(\'11\')\\n                break\\n            case \'11\':\\n                return\\n        }\\n    }\\n}",\

name: Calculate
content:
t = parseFloat(msg.payload[0])
rh = parseFloat(msg.payload[1])
mod = f.get('modifier')
b = 18.678
c = 257.14
d = 234.5
y = Math.log(rh/100*Math.exp((b-t/d)*(t/(c+t))))
dp = c*y/(b-y)
pl(dp + mod)

name: Controller
Processor
Facbusy
content:
fanbusy = f.get('fanbusy')
airconbusy = f.get('airconbusy')
facbusy = '0'
if (fanbusy == '1' || airconbusy == '1') {
    facbusy = '1'
}
f.set('facbusy', facbusy)

name: Level 0
content:
fan = f.get('fan')
aircon = f.get('aircon')
level = aircon + fan
switch (level) {
    case '00':
        msg.topic = 'Level 0'
        pl("Fan OFF / AIrcon OFF")
        break
    case '01':
        msg.topic = 'Level 1'
        pl("Fan ON / AIrcon OFF")
        break
    case '10':
        msg.topic = 'Level 2'
        pl("Fan OFF / AIrcon ON")
        break
    case '11':
        msg.topic = 'Level 3'
        pl("Fan ON / AIrcon ON")
        break
}
